posts.post_content:
N172 Old Judge Chas. Com[m]iskey (86-4a) -- NOW ON eBay with option to make offers....

(Catching, hands cupped about chin high, looking up at the ball) listed as 
"Chas. Comiskey 1st B. Capt. St. Louis Browns" w/ 1887 copyright.
Graded PSA 2 - Good with MK qualifier -- there is a black mark (should be evident in the scan) on the lower right border although I think the +"MK" is for the back where there was pencil (or something) erased...
There is a very subtle surface wrinkle on the upper right near the border otherwise I think PSA would have given it at least a 4 or 5 (with the qualifier) -- anyway the image is good (could be a little lighter) and the corners and edges are nice although the cut is a bit weird....
Please make up your mind by looking at the scans....
If interested please email me at:
 [url]bhodes@rcn.com[/url]

posts.post_title: Now on eBay (BIN w/ offers option)
posts.post_content: Now on eBay (BIN w/ offers option)
